property.name: Text
property.value: While attached character is defending, other participating characters do not count their STR unless their controller kneels 2 influence for each character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gets +2 STR and cannot be chosen as the only target of an event card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Armor.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Kneel Icy Helm to save attached character from being killed or discarded.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which attached character participated, kneel Wolf King's Bannerman to stand all participating Stark characters.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Arya Stark leaves play, kneel 2 influence to choose and kill a character with STR 3 or lower.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After the plot phase begins, kneel Bran Stark to not reveal a new plot card that phase and count 6 total initiative. Then, at the beginning of the draw phase, choose and reveal a new plot card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lady. House Tully.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Catelyn Stark from your hand, you may place her on your Stark House card as your only Agenda with the text: "All characters lose all 'cannot be killed,' all 'cannot be discarded,' and all immunity.".

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have 2 or more plot cards in your used pile, Eddard Stark gets +3 STR and does not kneel to attack or defend.. If you have 5 or more plot cards in your used pile, remove Eddard Stark from the game.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Renown. Deadly.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. House Umber.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Greatjon Umber leaves play, all House Umber characters get +4 STR until the end of the phase.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Direwolf.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Grey Wind is killed, search your deck for any number of Stark Creature cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No Attachments. Deadly.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bastard. Night's Watch.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a Stark or Night's Watch character leaves play, stand Jon Snow.

property.name: Text

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. House Umber.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which Frozen Fighters participated, choose and kill a participating chaacter with a STR that is lower than the number of Stark characters you control.

property.value: Stoic Bannerman gets +3 STR when it is defending alone.

property.value: Dominance: Kneel Executioner's Block and discard a Stark character from play (cannot be saved) to choose and kill a non-Army character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel Northern Hamlet to lower the cost of the next Stark character you play this phase by 1 (by 2 instead if you control a King or Queen character).

property.value: House Arryn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Snow Castle to choose a Stark character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +1 STR for each Stark character in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Training Yard to choose an attacking ro defending War character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR and gains Stalwart.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Winterfell Hot Spring to look at the top card of your deck. You may put this card on the bottom of your deck.

property.value: Attached character gets +2 STR. Response: After you win a challenge in which attached character participated, draw a card for each power on Widow's Wail.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a challenge in which attached character participated resolves, kneel Boy-King's Bannerman to choose all other participating characters. Those characters cannot stand during the standing phase this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a player counts income, kneel Tywin Lannister to have that player discard the top card of his or her deck for each gold he or she spends that phase. If that player spends less than 4 gold, stand Tywin Lannister at the end of the marshalling phase.

property.value: After Army of Scorpions is killed or discarded from play, return all unique Martell characters and attachments from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No Attachments. Deadly.

property.name: Text
property.value: After Childish Tell-Tale comes into play, choose a Martell character. Return that character to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response Kneel Chronicler at the Tor to cancel the effects of an opponent's character ability just triggered.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: Kneel Collector of Favors to choose and kneel an influence-providing location. Then, you may stand an influence-providing location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you lose a challenge in which Desert Assassin participated as a defender, return both Desert Assassin and an attacking character to their owners' hands.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you lose a challenge as the defender, discard Desert Hermit to reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put all revealed event cards into your hand and discard the rest.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Vengeful. Deadly.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No Attachments.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Yronwood.

property.name: Text
property.value: X is the number of Martell characters you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: After a Military Battle plot card is revealed, each player must choose one of his or her characters, if able. Kneel the rest.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Desert Stocks to choose an attacking or defending character. Until the end of the round, that character cannot stand or be removed from a challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: During a challenge, discard Desolate Canyon from play to immediately end the challenge without resolving it. Stand all participating characters. The attacking player may initiate an additional challenge of the same type this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel Dornish Hamlet to lower the cost of the next Martell character you play this phase by 1 (by 2 instead if you control a King or Queen character).

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel The Scourge to choose a character with at least 1 attachment. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a MIL, INT, and POW icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a WAR character or Kingdom location you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a NOBLE character or Kingdom location you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a HOLY character or Kingdom location you control.

property.name: House
property.value: Stark. Lannister. Baratheon. Greyjoy. Targaryen. Martell.

property.name: Text
property.value: During POW challenges, raise the claim value on all revealed plot cards by 1 if there is at least 1 Power Struggle plot card revealed.

property.name: House
property.value: Stark. Lannister. Baratheon. Greyjoy. Targaryen. Martell.

property.name: Text
property.value: After a player wins a POW challenge and there is at least 1 Power Struggle plot card revealed, kneel all cards named The Stormlands. Then that player may claim 1 power for his or her House.

property.name: House
property.value: Stark. Lannister. Baratheon. Greyjoy. Targaryen. Martell.

property.name: Text
property.value: After a player wins an INT challenge and there is at least 1 Intrigue Gambit plot card revealed, kneel all cards named The Westerlands. Then, that player may draw a card.

property.name: House
property.value: Stark. Lannister. Baratheon. Greyjoy. Targaryen. Martell.

property.name: Text
property.value: After a player wins a MIL challenge and there is at least Military Battle plot card revealed, kneel all cards named The North. Then, that player may choose and kill a r character of STR 2 or lower.

property.name: House
property.value: Stark. Lannister. Baratheon. Greyjoy. Targaryen. Martell.

property.name: Text
property.value: During MIL challenges, raise the claim value on all revealed plot cards by 1 if there is at least 1 Military Battle plot card revealed.

property.name: House
property.value: Stark. Lannister. Baratheon. Greyjoy. Targaryen. Martell.

property.name: Text
property.value: After a player reveals a Power Struggle plot card, kneel all cards named The Vale. Then, each player may put an in-House character with a POW icon and printed cost 3 or lower into play from his or her hand.

property.name: House
property.value: Stark. Lannister. Baratheon. Greyjoy. Targaryen. Martell.

property.name: Text
property.value: During INT challenges, raise the claim value on all revealed plot cards by 1 if there is at least 1 Intrigue Gambit plot card revealed.

property.name: House
property.value: Stark. Lannister. Baratheon. Greyjoy. Targaryen. Martell.

property.name: Text
property.value: After a player reveals a Military Battle plot card, kneel all cards named The Riverlands. Then, each player may put an in-House character with a MIL icon and printed cost 3 or lower into play from his or her hand.

property.name: House
property.value: Stark. Lannister. Baratheon. Greyjoy. Targaryen. Martell.

property.name: Text
property.value: After a player reveals an Intrigue Gambit plot card, kneel all cards named The Reach. Then. each player may put an in-House character with an INT icon and printed cost 3 or lower into play from his or her hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: WAR character only. At the end of the challenges phase, if attached character is standing, each opponent that initiated a challenge against you must choose and kill a character he or she controls.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character loses a POW icon, the King trait, and the Queen trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains an INT icon. While any revealed plot card has the Intrigue Gambit trait, attached character gets +4 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains a POW icon. While any revealed plot card has the Power Struggle trait, attached character gets +4 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains a MIL icon. While any revealed plot card has the Military Battle trait, attached character gets +4 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Beric Dondarrion is killed, all Brotherhood characters get +2 STR until the end of the phase. At the end of the round, return Beric Dondarrion to play, knelt, from your dead pile.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ally. Bastard. Brotherhood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Gendry to attach an Armor attachment in your discard pile to a character in play.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No Attachments except Weapon or Armor.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Brotherhood. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Discard your hand of at least 1 card to choose an opponent. Until the end of the phase, switch plot cards with that opponent.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. Kingsguard.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the beginning of the dominance phase, choose and kneel a non-Kingsguard character. Then, stand Ser Boros Blount.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. Kingsguard.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Choose and discard an attachment card from your hand to save a NOBLE character from being killed or discarded from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains deadly and a MIL icon. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Brotherhood. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Thoros of Myr from your hand, you may place him on your House card as your only Agenda with the text: "Marshalling: Pay the printed gold cost of a unique character in your dead pile to shuffle that character back into your deck. (Limit 1 per round.)"

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Vargo Hoat to choose and stand a location. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Lower the cost for each player to play Army characters by 1 if there is at least 1 Kingdom location in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Kingsguard Squire to choose and stand a Kingsguard character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. Clansman.

property.name: Text
property.value: Military Battle, Intrigue Gambit, and Power Struggle plot cards you reveal gain: +5 INITIATIVE

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No Attachments. Stealth.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. Night's Watch.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel 1 influence to choose a keyword on a character in play. Until the end of the phase, Riders from Eastwatch gains that keyword.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No Attachments.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. Brotherhood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Woodland Bandits gets +2 STR for each Military Battle, Intrigue Gambit, and Power Struggle plot card in your used pile.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No Attachments. Stealth.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters and locations without the King or Queen trait come into play knelt. Response: After a King or Queen character is killed, kneel King's Landing to claim 2 power for your House.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel Tobho Mott's Armory to raise or lower the cost of the next Weapon or Armor attachment played this phase by 2.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing. Stronghold.

property.name: Text
property.value: Kingsguard characters get +2 STR and do not kneel to defend during POW challenges.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No Attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel Forgotten Hamlet to lower the cost of the next character you play this phase by 1 (by 2 instead if you control a King or Queen character).

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel High Ground to choose and stand an Army character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: Muddy Way comes into play knelt. Marshalling: Kneel Muddy Way to lower the cost of the next character you play this phase by 1 for each Kingdom location you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Remove an attacking or defending WAR character you control from a challenge to choose and kill a participating non-WAR character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which a NOBLE character participated, move 2 power from the losing player's House card to that character. (Limit 1 per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Lower the cost of the next HOLY character you play this phase by X, where X is that character's printed cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a LEARNED character Iis killed, reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put each character revealed in this way into your hand and discard the rest of the cards revealed by this effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Shuffle all Night's Watch characters in all dead and discard piles back into their owner's decks.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Save a Greyjoy character from being killed. Then, attach And Rises Again to that character. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Attached character gains intimidate.")

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel 1 influence to choose a participating character to get +3 STR until the end of the challenge. After the challenge resolves, until the end of the phase, that character gets -1 STR and is killed if its STR is O.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: Exchange a Targaryen attachment in your hand with a Targaryen character or attachment with an equal or lower printed cost in your discard or dead pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: If you have a higher total initiative than an opponent, cancel the effects of an event card just played by that opponent

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Choose a card in play. If that card's text box is currently being treated as blank, restroe its text box until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a MIL challenge with at least 1 Military Battle plot card revealed, choose and discard up to 2 non-limited locations from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel 2 influence or a Martell LEARNED character to choose a player. That player chooses and discards 2 cards from his or her hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to return any number of Night's Watch characters you control to their owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Before an event resolves, discard the top 4 cards of its controller's deck. If 2 or more non-character cards are discarded in this way, cancel the effects of the event.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Greyjoy only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a player claims 1 or more power for his or her House, move that power to a Lannister character.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Lannister only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win dominance, choose a character that does not have the King trait or the Queen trait. Kill that character. (Limit 1 per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Choose a plot card in any player's used pile. Until the end of the phase, that plot either gains or loses a Trait of your choice.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to choose 2 players. Until the end of the phase, "Response:" effects cannot be triggered by those players.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel 3 influence or a Stark WAR character to choose and kill an attacking character.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a character you control leaves play, choose and kneel a character controlled by an opponent. Then, draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After an opponent takes control of one of your cards, choose and discard a card he or she controls from play (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel 2 influence to give all Stark characters you control Stalwart until the end of the phase.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you lose dominance, kneel 2 influence to return all standing characters to their owners' hands.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: Until the end of the phase, each Targaryen character in your hand gains Ambush. (Limit 1 per game.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which a Baratheon character participated, claim 1 power for your House for every 4 STR you won the challenge by. (Limit 1 per phase.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only.

card.name: Too Late to Spill the Wine

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Until the end of the phase, each player cannot declare more than 1 attacker or defender in each challenge.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a location you control leaves play choose and kneel a location controlled by an opponent. Then, draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: Until the end of the phase, each Lannister character you control gains: "Any phase: Kneel this character to choose and kneel a character with equal or lower printed STR."

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Lannister only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Military Battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player may initiate an additional MIL challenge this round.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Military Battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: In order to declare any characters to attack or defend during a MIL challenge, a player must declare all of his or her eligible characters to that challenge.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Power Struggle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player may initiate an additional POW challenge this round.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Military Battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you win a MIL challenge, search your deck for an in-House location with printed cost 3 or lower and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Military Battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of the challenges phase, each player who has not won a MIL challenge must choose and kill a character he or she controls.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue Gambit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any attachment or location card that would be discarded from an opponent's hand as part of the claim of an INT challenge may be put into play by the winner of the challenge, under his or her control.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Power Struggle.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you win a POW challenge, search your deck for a character that can be legally placed on your House card as an Agenda, and place it on your House card.

property.name: Text
property.value: After a player has declared 2 challenges, he or she cannot declare further challenges that phase.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Military Battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: After a challenge resolves, kill all defending characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the beginning of the marshalling phase, reveal your hand. Discard all cards in your hand that do not have your House affiliation.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Power Struggle.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you win a POW challenge, lower the non-variable influence cost of the next event or character ability you trigger this round to 0.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue Gambit.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you win an INT challenge, choose and kneel up to 3 characters and/or locations.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue Gambit.

property.name: Text
property.value: After a player loses an intrigue challenge, that player must choose and kill a character under his or her control.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Military Battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: After a player loses a MIL challenge, choose and kill one of that player's characters.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue Gambit.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you win an INT challenge, choose and discard an attachment from play.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Power Struggle.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you win a POW challenge, search your deck for a King or Queen character and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue Gambit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any character card that would be discarded from an opponent's hand as part of the claim of an INT challenge may be put into play by the winner of the challenge, under his or her control.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue Gambit.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you win an INT challenge, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all revealed event cards into your hand, and put the rest at the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Military Battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you win a MIL challenge as the attacker, you may declare another MIL challenge if you declare twice as many attacking characters as you declared in the challenge just won.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue Gambit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player may initiate an additional INT challenge this round.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Military Battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: You cannot declare INT challenges.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Power Struggle.

property.name: Text
property.value: If a King or Queen character would be killed, instead return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Power Struggle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Double the printed influence value on all Kingdom locations you control.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue Gambit.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you win an INT challenge, you may put all cards in your hand on the bottom of your deck and replace them with an equal number of cards from the top of your deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Power Struggle.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you win a POW challenge, search your deck for an in-House character with printed cost 3 or lower and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Power Struggle.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you win dominance, discard from play all characters, locations, and attachments that do not have their controller's House affiliation. Then, choose and kill a King or Queen character, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, each player chooses up to 3 of his or her characters. All characters not chosen are killed (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot be cancelled. When revealed, the player with the most cards in hand chooses and discards cards from his her hand until he or she has 4 cards in hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may not run neutral characters or locations in your deck. Before you draw your set-up hand, you may remove (from the game) up to 15 cards in your deck. You must still have at least 60 cards in your deck after doing so.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may not run neutral characters or locations in your deck. You may have 8 cards in your plot deck. After you reveal your 7th plot, move your 8th plot card into your used pile.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Lannister only.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may not run neutral characters or locations in your decks. You may play with two 30 card decks. You may not have more than one copy of a card in a deck. (When an effect refers to a deck, the controller of the effect chooses between the two decks.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may not run neutral characters or locations in your deck. Your minimum deck size is 45 cards.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Greyjoy only.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may not run neutral characters or locations in your deck. Your out of House gold penalty is reduced by 1.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may not run neutral characters or locations in your deck. You may have an additional copy of any one plot card in your plot deck.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only.
